714760.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 4 - Soundtrack
714760.description:
Remember running home from the record store, hands shaking as they eagerly tore off the packaging from the LP you’d waited months to buy? The vinyl’s aroma as you carefully placed it on the spindle of your record player, giddy with excitement as the awesomeness of your favorite band’s latest work jumped from your stereo speakers? Well, you’re old and weird. Here’s the music from The Jackbox Party Pack 4.

The Jackbox Party Pack 4 Soundtrack Track List
